CORBInput Struct Reference

#include <VLIB_orb.h>

Collaboration diagram for CORBInput:

[legend]

Detailed Description

Structure defining the ORB Input (input buffers containing data needed for various stages of ORB).

Definition at line 204 of file VLIB_orb.h.

Automatically populated by calling cORB_init()

uint8_t* CORBInput::image

User-populated input image

Definition at line 207 of file VLIB_orb.h.

uint8_t* CORBInput::prefimage

Reserved: Can be NULL since it is NOT currently used in VLIB

Definition at line 208 of file VLIB_orb.h.

int16_t* CORBInput::harrisImage

User-populated pointer to the harris score output obtained by calling VLIB_harrisScore_7x7

Definition at line 209 of file VLIB_orb.h.

uint32_t* CORBInput::integralImage

User-populated pointer to the integral image obtained by calling VLIB_integralImage8

Definition at line 210 of file VLIB_orb.h.

char* CORBInput::scratchBuffer

User-populated pointer to scratch buffer of size returned by calling getRequiredScratchSize(). Must be 8 byte aligned

Definition at line 211 of file VLIB_orb.h.

int8_t* CORBInput::orbPattern31

User-populated pointer to precomputed orbPattern31 array (found in VLIB_orb_idat.c file)
